s_synopsis: Strap yourself in the cockpit, step on the gas and take a turbo-charged ride through the high-speed world of Formula One racing with "Exhaust Heat". You'll test your skill on the famed hairpins of Monte Carlo. Steel your nerves on the legendary straights of Monza. Race to win on a total of 16 thrilling international courses. Best of all, you can customize your racer millions of different ways.
